Our Services

Our Focus

Finance is the lifeline of any business. Rayon Capital, a Full Service Investment bank based in India, provides end-to-end financial solutions to medium and large corporates houses. We ensure that our clients’ gets their finance requirements from the right source at the right time. We understand our clients' requirements and develop solutions for the most complex or the simplest, the biggest or the smallest financial transaction.

CLIENT APPROACH

INNOVATION

WHO WE ARE

Rayon Capital is a full Service Investment bank focused on clients and their 'end to end' needs in Debt Syndication, Equity Offerings, and Advisory Services. With a thorough understanding of the life cycle of various industries and passion to fulfil needs of our esteemed clientele, Rayon Capital delivers ‘customized offerings’ to SMEs and Large Corporate Houses. Customization being the key determinant in today’s dynamic scenario, we have designed our offerings in such a way that most of our clients’ requirement in the area of Debt, Equity and Advisory Services are fulfilled under a SINGLE UMBRELLA.
We are an enabler and a catalyst in our clients’ growth.

Our Customized Solutions have helped create new arrays and avenues enabling our clients’ to meet their growth aspirations. Creativity, up-to-date financial knowledge and innovation are the key factors which help us address unique opportunities. We encourage new ideas, aspirations, visions and strategies and convert it into action. We are aware of the trust our clients place in us and ensure that we do everything possible to raise our bar each time. It is because of this quality of service we provide that we get loyalty and repeat business from our clients. We are an enabler and a catalyst in our clients’ growth. Providing customised cost effective solutions to our clients’ financial needs are paramount to us, hence our mantra: “If our clients’ succeed, we succeed”.
